meanings.definition: The act of making something plural.
meanings.sent1: She enjoyed practicing her pluralizations in English class.
meanings.sent2: The teacher explained the importance of pluralizations in grammar.
meanings.sent3: The pluralizations of the word 'cat' made it sound like a whole group of felines.
meanings.sent4: Her pluralizations of ideas brought a new perspective to the discussion.
meanings.sent5: The pluralizations of colors in the painting added depth and vibrancy.

meanings.definition: The result of making something plural.
meanings.sent1: The pluralizations of nouns can sometimes be tricky to remember.
meanings.sent2: After adding 's' to the word, the pluralizations were complete.
meanings.sent3: The pluralizations of the menu items made it hard to choose just one.
meanings.sent4: The pluralizations of trees in the forest created a beautiful sight.
meanings.sent5: His pluralizations of the team names made the tournament more exciting.
